body: This rating refers only to the fact that the order arrived promptly and was exactly what I ordered.  Obviously there is no way I can evaluate the health aspects of this vitamin as thoy would differ from one person to another.  The reason I take it, along with B-1 and B-12, is that many years ago I had some neurological problems.  Two doctors recommended taking B vitamins; I followed their recommendations,  my symptoms disappeared, and have never recurred.  I used to take the B-50 combo, but eventually I found it contained supplements that I don't want such as niacin.  So I had to take the B's separately.  Our local pharmacies and supermarkets no long stock NatureMade's  B-6, so I obtained it through Amazon. (thanks Amazon).  Why NatureMade?  Because some of their vitamins are U.S.P., including B-6, which means that each pill contains exactly what NatureMade says it does, and is readily absorbed by the body.  Unless a supplement is U.S.P., you cannot be sure that it will be really effective.
title: Two doctors recommended taking B vitamins

Side effects can include neurological damage, among other things. I've taken to emptying out half the capsule before taking it. They do state on the bottle that you should take it without taking similar amounts of the other B vitamins, I guess some people take this short term to combat the symptoms of serious diseases, but for general use I think it's too much - do the research and make sure it's safe for you.
